job_tasks.phrase: adept at leading projects to success in uncertain environments
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to leadership in project execution, which is a core aspect of software development project management.

job_tasks.phrase: proven track record of sophisticated software delivery
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions 'software delivery,' indicating a focus on the execution and deployment of software.

job_tasks.phrase: manage the delivery of high-quality software products and features based on GenAI technology
job_tasks.justification: Highlights managing the delivery of software products and features, specifically mentioning GenAI technology as the basis.
Indicates that the software products and features are built upon GenAI technology, implying some level of involvement with generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead the development and integration of GenAI components
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions leading the development and integration of GenAI components, which falls under the scope of modeling and its application.
Focuses on the integration of GenAI components into existing systems, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of services into our product ecosystem
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating services, a key software development activity, and collaboration with other teams.

job_tasks.phrase: review and enhance our service offerings
job_tasks.justification: Implies ongoing development and improvement of software services.
While a leadership role, guiding engineering teams in their development tasks is part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay informed about the latest GenAI technologies and approaches, assessing their relevance to enhance our services
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding and evaluating GenAI technologies for enhancement, touching on the modeling aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive the timely and successful delivery of software services
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the operational aspect of ensuring timely and successful delivery of services.

soft_skills.phrase: Your skill in overcoming complex challenges
solution-oriented approaches to meet dynamic project needs
Stay informed about the latest GenAI technologies

classification.rationale: While the role mentions GenAI technology, it emphasizes general software development leadership, delivery, and integration. There's no explicit mention of core GenAI Engineer tasks like fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or building RAG systems, making it lean towards general software engineering with a GenAI component rather than a specialized GenAI Engineer role.
